--- create_table_anonymous_primary_key.sql
CREATE TABLE PKsTable(
  PK1 INT64,
  PK2 INT64,
  PRIMARY KEY (PK1, PK2)
)
--- AST
&ast.CreateTable{
  Rparen:           74,
  PrimaryKeyRparen: -1,
  Name:             &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 13,
        NameEnd: 21,
        Name:    "PKsTable",
      },
    },
  },
  Columns: []*ast.ColumnDef{
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Key:  -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 25,
        NameEnd: 28,
        Name:    "PK1",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 29,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      Hidden: -1,
    },
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Key:  -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 38,
        NameEnd: 41,
        Name:    "PK2",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 42,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      Hidden: -1,
    },
  },
  TableConstraints: []*ast.TableConstraint{
    &ast.TableConstraint{
      ConstraintPos: -1,
      Constraint:    &ast.TablePrimaryKey{
        Primary: 51,
        Rparen:  72,
        Columns: []*ast.IndexKey{
          &ast.IndexKey{
            DirPos: -1,
            Name:   &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 64,
              NameEnd: 67,
              Name:    "PK1",
            },
          },
          &ast.IndexKey{
            DirPos: -1,
            Name:   &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 69,
              NameEnd: 72,
              Name:    "PK2",
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE TABLE PKsTable (
  PK1 INT64,
  PK2 INT64,
  PRIMARY KEY (PK1, PK2)
)
